subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Roma defeated Inter Milan, 1-0, to win only its second Supercup, Italy’s traditional season opener.Daniele De Rossi converted a penalty in the 78th minute after Francesco Totti was fouled by Inter defender Nicolas Burdisso.The Serie A season kicks off Saturday.
